entities.description: Age group of the individual who bought the last alcoholic beverage if the buyer was under age 21 or age 21 or older.
The relationship of the person who bought the alcoholic beverage to the respondent.
The source from which the respondent obtained the last alcoholic beverage they drank.

relationships.description: Specifies the age group of the person who bought the last alcoholic beverage for the respondent.
Indicates the respondent's relationship to the person who bought the alcoholic beverage for them.
Describes the source from which the respondent obtained the last alcoholic beverage they consumed.
